original_text: To this day they do according to the former manner. They do not fear the Lord, and they do not follow the statutes or the rules or the law or the commandment that the Lord commanded the children of Jacob, whom he named Israel.
korean_text: 그들이 오늘까지 이전 풍속대로 행하여 여호와를 경외하지 아니하며 또 여호와께서 이스라엘이라 이름을 주신 야곱의 자손에게 명령하신 율례와 법도와 율법과 계명을 준행하지 아니하는도다

sentences.original_text: To this day they do according to the former manner.
They do not fear the Lord,
and they do not follow the statutes or the rules or the law or the commandment
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 규례나 규칙이나 율법이나 계명을 따르지 않습니다.

sentences.original_text: that the Lord commanded the children of Jacob,
